resources.string: Kobweb is an opinionated framework built on top of Compose HTML. It includes everything you need to build rich, dynamic websites, as well as web applications, while being able to leverage the greater Kotlin ecosystem.
Build your Compose HTML apps quicker and easier
Annotate a composable method with @Page to make it a route
An environment built from the ground up around live reloading
Built-in support for multiple color modes
Silk is a UI layer included with Kobweb and built upon Compose HTML
Powerful and simple API for defining and overriding styles
Supports static site exports for improved SEO
Annotate methods with @Api to generate server API endpoints
Easily include Font Awesome and/or Material Design icons
Adds familiar Modifier, Box, Row, and Columns concepts to Compose HTML
Compose HTML means you can leverage a massive ecosystem of NPM packages and JS libraries
An open source project built with a friendly license and a welcoming community
Kobweb CLI provides commands to handle the tedious parts of building a Compose HTML app, including project setup and configuration
Visit our docs, with tutorials and API examples to get you up and running with your own site in no time.
Kobweb is fully open source and community driven. We invite you to help make Kobweb the best web development framework!
Join our community for instant support and great conversations about the future of the Kobweb and web development using Kotlin.
